text:
Viome | Software Engineer | Cupertino, CA | Full-time, Onsite | http://viome.com/joinus/

VIOME is a wellness as a service company that applies machine learning to varied biological data - from genome to mobile application data - to provide you with personalized recommendations for a healthy living. Viome has an exciting and small interdisciplinary team where you will be working with experts in medicine, genomics, big data and machine learning.
